= Introduction =

Congratulations to the readers of the Russian Wiktionary, since the graphical user interface is ready to be tested. 

= Software requirements =

Install [http://javafx.com/downloads JavaFX SDK].

= Download =

Windows executable file (tested with Windows XP and Vista):

= Future =

The plans are to continue the development and add support for the English Wiktionary.
